manifest:
builder:
  track: dev
  medium: memory

labels:
  type: web
  app-group: estafette-ci
  team: estafette-team
  language: nodejs

version:
  semver:
    major: 1
    minor: 0
    patch: 0
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}-{{auto}}'
    releaseBranch: 1.0.0

stages:
  audit-and-restore:
    parallelStages:
      snyk:
        image: extensions/snyk:dev
        severity-threshold: medium

      audit:
        image: extensions/npm-audit:dev
        action: audit
        level: low
        dev-level: critical
        workspace: estafette
        channels:
        - '#npm-audit'

      restore:
        image: node:15-alpine
        commands:
        - npm ci

  lint-and-build:
    parallelStages:
      lint:
        image: node:15-alpine
        commands:
        - npm run lint

      build:
        image: node:15-alpine
        commands:
        - npm run build

      lint-helm-chart:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        action: lint

      package-helm-chart:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        action: package

  bake:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    action: build
    severity: unknown
    repositories:
    - estafette
    path: ./dist
    copy:
    - favicon.ico
    - nginx.vh.default.conf
    - docker-entrypoint.sh
    - package-lock.json

  test:
    services:
    - name: ci.estafette.io
      image: estafette/estafette-ci-web:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
      readiness:
        path: /robots.txt
        port: 5000

    image: node:15-alpine
    commands:
    - apk add curl
    - curl --fail http://ci.estafette.io:5000/manifest/encrypt

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    retries: 5
    action: push
    repositories:
    - estafette

  test-helm-chart:
    services:
    - name: kubernetes
      image: bsycorp/kind:latest-1.19
      readiness:
        path: /kubernetes-ready
        port: 10080
        timeoutSeconds: 120
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    action: test
    values: |-
      extraLabels:
        team: estafette

      extraSecrets:
      - key: gcp
        annotations: {}
        mountPath: /gcp
        data:
          service-account-key.json: |
            {}

      extraConfigmaps:
      - key: templates
        annotations: {}
        mountPath: /templates
        data: |
          manifest-docker.tmpl: |
            labels:
              container: {{.ContainerName}}
              team: {{.TeamName}}
              language: docker

            stages:
              bake:
                image: extensions/docker:stable
                action: build
                repositories:
                - estafette

              push-to-docker-registry:
                image: extensions/docker:stable
                action: push
                repositories:
                - estafette

  clone-charts-repo:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    repo: helm-charts
    branch: main

  publish-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    action: publish
    repoBranch: main

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    workspace: estafette
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' ||
      status == 'failed'

releases:
  tooling-estafette:
    actions:
    - name: deploy-simple
    - name: restart-simple
      hideBadge: true
    clone: true
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:dev
        namespace: estafette-ci
        strategytype: AtomicUpdate
        visibility: iap
        iapOauthClientID: ***
        iapOauthClientSecret: ***
        imagePullSecretUser: ***
        imagePullSecretPassword: ***
        container:
          repository: estafette
          cpu:
            request: 12m
          memory:
            request: 125Mi
            limit: 125Mi
          liveness:
            path: /robots.txt
          readiness:
            path: /robots.txt
          metrics:
            scrape: false
        sidecars:
        - type: openresty
          cpu:
            request: 12m
          memory:
            request: 125Mi
            limit: 125Mi
        vpa:
          enabled: true
          updateMode: "Off"
        hosts:
        - ***
        - ***
        chaosproof: true
        manifests:
          files:
          - gke/ingress.yaml

      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
        workspace: estafette
        channels:
        - '#build-status'
        when:
          status == 'succeeded' ||
          status == 'failed'
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: dev
  os: linux
  medium: memory
  type: docker
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  language: nodejs
  team: estafette-team
  type: web
version:
  semver:
    major: 1
    minor: 0
    patch: "0"
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}-{{auto}}'
    releaseBranch: 1.0.0
stages:
  audit-and-restore:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: extensions/snyk:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      severity-threshold: medium
    - image: extensions/npm-audit:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: audit
      channels:
      - '#npm-audit'
      dev-level: critical
      level: low
      workspace: estafette
    - image: node:15-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm ci
      when: status == 'succeeded'
  lint-and-build:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: node:15-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm run lint
      when: status == 'succeeded'
    - image: node:15-alpine
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      commands:
      - npm run build
      when: status == 'succeeded'
    - image: extensions/helm:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: lint
    - image: extensions/helm:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: package
  bake:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    action: build
    copy:
    - favicon.ico
    - nginx.vh.default.conf
    - docker-entrypoint.sh
    - package-lock.json
    path: ./dist
    repositories:
    - estafette
    severity: unknown
  test:
    image: node:15-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - apk add curl
    - curl --fail http://ci.estafette.io:5000/manifest/encrypt
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    services:
    - name: ci.estafette.io
      image: estafette/estafette-ci-web:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
      shell: /bin/sh
      multiStage: false
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      readiness:
        path: /robots.txt
        timeoutSeconds: 60
        port: 5000
        protocol: http
        hostname: ci.estafette.io
  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: extensions/docker:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    retries: 5
    action: push
    repositories:
    - estafette
  test-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    services:
    - name: kubernetes
      image: bsycorp/kind:latest-1.19
      shell: /bin/sh
      multiStage: false
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      readiness:
        path: /kubernetes-ready
        timeoutSeconds: 120
        port: 10080
        protocol: http
        hostname: kubernetes
    action: test
    values: |-
      extraLabels:
        team: estafette

      extraSecrets:
      - key: gcp
        annotations: {}
        mountPath: /gcp
        data:
          service-account-key.json: |
            {}

      extraConfigmaps:
      - key: templates
        annotations: {}
        mountPath: /templates
        data: |
          manifest-docker.tmpl: |
            labels:
              container: {{.ContainerName}}
              team: {{.TeamName}}
              language: docker

            stages:
              bake:
                image: extensions/docker:stable
                action: build
                repositories:
                - estafette

              push-to-docker-registry:
                image: extensions/docker:stable
                action: push
                repositories:
                - estafette
  clone-charts-repo:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    branch: main
    repo: helm-charts
  publish-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    action: publish
    repoBranch: main
  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    workspace: estafette
releases:
  tooling-estafette:
    builder:
      track: dev
      os: linux
      medium: memory
      type: docker
    clone: true
    actions:
    - name: deploy-simple
    - name: restart-simple
      hideBadge: true
    stages:
      deploy:
        image: extensions/gke:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
        chaosproof: true
        container:
          cpu:
            request: 12m
          liveness:
            path: /robots.txt
          memory:
            limit: 125Mi
            request: 125Mi
          metrics:
            scrape: false
          readiness:
            path: /robots.txt
          repository: estafette
        hosts:
        - ***
        - ***
        iapOauthClientID: ***
        iapOauthClientSecret: ***
        imagePullSecretPassword: ***
        imagePullSecretUser: ***
        manifests:
          files:
          - gke/ingress.yaml
        namespace: estafette-ci
        sidecars:
        - cpu:
            request: 12m
          memory:
            limit: 125Mi
            request: 125Mi
          type: openresty
        strategytype: AtomicUpdate
        visibility: iap
        vpa:
          enabled: true
          updateMode: "Off"
      slack-notify:
        image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
        channels:
        - '#build-status'
        workspace: estafette
